SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine

Class Vector<D extends Dim>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine.Vector<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The dimension type (Dim2d, Dim3d, etc.)
public class Vector<D extends Dim> extends Object
A generic vector class that can handle different dimensions. Provides standard vector operations like addition, scaling, dot product, etc.
See Also:
  • Dim

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is invalid

    • add

      public Vector<D> add(Vector<D> other) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds another vector to this one.
      Parameters:
      other - The vector to add
      Returns:
      A new vector that is the sum of this vector and the other
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if vectors have different dimensions

    • subtract

      public Vector<D> subtract(Vector<D> other) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Subtracts another vector from this one.
      Parameters:
      other - The vector to subtract
      Returns:
      A new vector that is the difference of this vector and the other
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if vectors have different dimensions

    • normalize

      public Vector<D> normalize()
      Creates a unit vector in the same direction as this vector.
      Returns:
      A new normalized vector with magnitude 1
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - if this is a zero vector
      See Also:
      • For getting the vector length

    • cross

      public Vector<D> cross(Vector<D> other)
      Calculates the cross product of this vector and another. Only defined for 3D vectors.
      Parameters:
      other - The other vector
      Returns:
      A new vector that is the cross product result
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if either vector is not 3D

      Returns:
      The angle in radians
      Throws:
